Package com.googlecode.aluminumproject.writers

The definition of a writer and a variety of implementations.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DecorativeWriter
    A writer that decorates another writer.
    Writer
    An output to write to.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDecorativeWriter
    Convenience superclass for decorative writers.
    AbstractOutputStreamWriter
    Writes to an output stream.
    AbstractWriter
    Convenience superclass for writers.
    FileWriter
    Writes to a file.
    ListWriter
    A writer that adds written objects to a list.
    NullWriter
    Ignores all written objects.
    OutputStreamWriter
    Writes to an existing output stream.
    PreserveWhitespaceWriter
    Writes text to an underlying writer while preserving only a number of contiguous characters of a certain type.
    ResponseWriter
    Writes to the output stream of a servlet response.
    StringWriter
    A writer that builds a string.
    TextWriter
    A writer that wraps another writer and writes strings to it.
    ToggleableWriter
    Writes objects to its underlying writer or ignores them, depending on its state.
    TrimWriter
    Trims text as it is written.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PreserveWhitespaceWriter.WhitespaceType
    A kind of whitespace.
    TrimWriter.TrimType
    A way to trim text.

Package com.googlecode.aluminumproject.writers Description

The definition of a writer and a variety of implementations. For an overview of all writers, please consult the wiki.
